inclusion.criterion: Subject is 65 years old who is able and willing to give an informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of acute coronary syndrome in the past 30 days.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications to placement of a Foley catheter in the bladder.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He had severe urethral stricture but was able to pass small catheter through.
